text: kya unake paanv hain jinase ve chalate hon ya unake haath hain jinase ve pakadate hon ya unake paas aankhen heen jinase ve dekhate hon ya unake kaan hain jinase ve sunate hon? kahon, "tum apane thaharae hu sahabhaagiyon ko bula lo, phir mere viruddh chaalen na chalo, is prakaar ki mujhe muhalat na do
